name: Shouldn't've Taken The Shortcut...
description:
Gameplay by: blakeb1

Music by: nematic5 (Find their page here: https://nematic5.itch.io/)

I recommend to play as a windows executable, as this will most likely play better.

You can't miss this special event... the only way for you to get to your destination is with the shortcuts in the caves. Learn how to cope with your surroundings and make sure you come out alive!

More updates should come soon, hopefully random cave generation, more levels, and more areas will come out soon! Stay tuned if you like what I have accomplished here!

Assets not created by me:

A*Pathfinding & Free Pixel Font - Thaleah
